description: Unique customer identifier, primary key in customer file
Application identifier, join key to outcomes
CRIF-like bureau score (NA for NTC customers)
Months since first tradeline in bureau (NA for NTC)
Number of tradelines present in bureau data (0 for many NTC)
Sum of sanctioned amounts across tradelines
Maximum DPD observed across tradelines in last 12 months
Total count of months with DPD>0 across tradelines in last 12 months
1 if any tradeline written off for this customer
Primary target: 1 if 60+ DPD by MOB6, else 0
